Usage: airtable-agent [options] [command]

H&S Platform Airtable Management Agent

Options:
  -V, --version   output the version number
  -h, --help      display help for command

Commands:
  audit           Perform database audit operations
  optimize        Analyze and implement optimizations
  maintain        Database maintenance operations
  monitor         Monitor database health and performance
  util            Utility operations
  help [command]  display help for command
